items.content_html: BiolockEmbed is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed to simplify the integration of your BioLock iframe into a parent website. With an intuitive API, it streamlines the communication between the iframe and your web application while offering extensive customization options.

With an intuitive API, it streamlines the communication between the iframe and your web application while offering extensive customization options.
